description: Test code for arrays and dictionaries - runs a suite of tests on your calculator.
source:
# Test code for arrays and dictionaries
def t1():
  A = {1:11,5:22}
  passert(A[5] == 22)
  passert(A[1] == 11)
  A[1] = 88
  passert(A[1] == 88)
  A[6] = 66
  passert(A[6] == 66)
  passert(A[5] == 22)
  passert(A[1] == 88)
  #PROMPT(A[1])
  #PROMPT(A[222])
  B = [1,2,3]
  B.append(4)
  passert(B[0] == 1)
  passert(B[1] == 2)
  passert(B[2] == 3)
  passert(B[3] == 4)
  B[2] = 333
  passert(B[2] == 333)
  print("all tests pass")
title: Test code for arrays and dictionaries
